title: How to Make a One Balloon Cat

steps.title: Make two inch-long bubbles.
steps.content: Make two inch-long bubbles. This is for the muzzle.

steps.title: Take the knot and wrap it around the last section.
steps.content: Take the knot and wrap it around the last section. The two bubbles should now be connected.

steps.title: Wrap the knot around the two bubbles.
steps.content: Wrap the knot around the two bubbles. This is to make sure they don't come apart and to get the knot out of the way.

steps.title: Make two tiny bubbles.
steps.content: Make two tiny bubbles. This is for the back of the head. Make sure they are the same size.

steps.title: Make five bubbles that are a little over an inch.
steps.content: Make five bubbles that are a little over an inch. This is for the head. When making them, count to ten while twisting each bubble.

steps.title: Twist the last of the two tiny bubbles you made in step #7 with the last of the five larger bubbles you made in step #8.
steps.content: Twist the last of the two tiny bubbles you made in step #7 with the last of the five larger bubbles you made in step #8. It should make a loop, kind of like a flower.

steps.title: Stick the muzzle through the hole.
steps.content: Stick the muzzle through the hole.

steps.title: Pinch the two little bubbles that are beside the center bubble.
steps.content: Pinch the two little bubbles that are beside the center bubble. To pinch them, pull it out and turn it.

steps.title: Make another small bubble for the neck.
steps.content: Make another small bubble for the neck.

steps.title: Add two bubbles that are three inches long.
steps.content: Add two bubbles that are three inches long. These will be the legs.

steps.title: Take the beginning section of the first 'bubble-leg' and twist it in with the last section of the second bubble-leg.
steps.content: Take the beginning section of the first 'bubble-leg' and twist it in with the last section of the second bubble-leg. Bend the legs down, where they are vertical.

steps.title: Add another small section for the body.
steps.content: Add another small section for the body. This section should just be a little over an inch.

steps.title: Now make two more three-inch bubbles for the hind legs.
steps.content: Now make two more three-inch bubbles for the hind legs. Twist them together like you did for the front legs earlier.

steps.title: Kink the tail.
steps.content: Kink the tail. Bend it in an 'S' shape and massage it for a few seconds. Turn the tail so it is facing up.
